蔨蔨蔨

蔨字的基本解释

蔨
juàn
即“鹿藿”，一种草本植物，叶似大豆，根黄而香。亦称“鹿豆”。

蔨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juàn］
［《廣韻》渠篆切，上獮，羣。］
草名。即鹿藿。又名鹿豆。
[②]［jùn］
［《集韻》巨殞切，上準，羣。］
同“菌1”。

蔨字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔨； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1055第18
【唐韻】渠殞切，音窘。【爾雅·釋草】蔨，鹿?。【註】今鹿豆也。【王磐·野菜譜】蔨，野鹿豆。　又【廣韻】渠篆切，音圈。義同。　又【集韻】同菌。

蔨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蔨字的起名意思

暂无。

Stubborn
Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
juàn
Namely "Luhuo", a herbaceous plant with leaves like soybeans and yellow and fragrant roots. Also known as "Ludou".
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juàn］
["Guangyun" Qu seal cut, upper 狝, group. ]
Cursive name. Namely Lu Huo. Also known as Ludou.
[②]［jùn］
["Jiyun" huge death cut, on the standard, group. ]
Same as "Bacteria 1".
Stubborn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　蔨; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1055 18
[Tang Yun] Qu died and cut, sound embarrassed. 【Erya Shicao】Nine, deer?. [Note] Ludou also today. 【Wang Pan·Wild Recipe】Nine, wild deer bean.　[Guang Yun] Qu seal cut, voice coil. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The same bacteria.

Name meaning
Nothing.
juàn, jùn
сущ.
1) juàn ринхозия, олений боб (также 鹿藿)
2) jùn вм. 菌 (грибок)
